title: Baillieston News
description: Get the latest news in the Baillieston area from BBC News.
content:
M73 Glasgow City - One lane closed and queuing traffic on M73 northbound before J2, M8 (Baillieston), because of a broken down lorry and a fuel spillage. Travel time is 15 minutes.

To report traffic and travel incidents dial 0330 123 0184 at any time
